title: Grey’s Anatomy Teases a New Pairing: Are You Feeling It?
description: I called it even before there was an “it” to be called. After Grey’s Anatomy’s Jules expressed her keen interest in working with Winston back in Season 19, I suspected that the show was toying with the idea of pairing them as more than colleagues. “Never say never,” showrunner Meg Marinis told TVLine way back […]
author: Charlie Mason

title: New Handmaid’s Tale Exhibit Pulls You Into June’s World (Without Having to Go to Gilead)
description: If you want to see some Handmaid’s Tale costumes and props up close without actually going Under His Eye, The Paley Center for Media in New York City has you covered. The museum is currently hosting an exhibit titled “The Legacy of The Handmaid’s Tale: June’s Evolution from Handmaid to Rebel.” The curated collection features […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Chris Lee Shines in Tracker Season 2 Episode 17 as the Series Takes a Break from the Darkness
description: Colter and Randy team up when Randy's ex-girlfriend calls for help during Tracker Season 2 Episode 17. Our review! The post Chris Lee Shines in Tracker Season 2 Episode 17 as the Series Takes a Break from the Darkness appeared first on TV Fanatic.
